description: Variation of condition 1 of the planning permission dated 10 May 2023 (RN: 23/00234/FULL) which itself varied condition 1 of the planning permission dated 4th October 2022 (RN 22/00448/FULL) for the demolition of the existing hipped roof and construction of a roof extension, a rear extension involving the infill of an existing undercroft area at ground floor, the replacement of an existing link building (between the building fronting Chapel Side and Esca House to the rear) and an additional second floor storey, and the excavation of a basement under the main building, in association with the change of use of the ground and first to residential flats (Class C3). Replacement windows to the front and rear elevations, and the creation of a terrace and green roof on the rear extension roof at third floor level and a terrace at rear fourth floor level, namely to increase size of basement level and creation of associated lightwell; Alterations to fenestration; relocation and alteration of rear dormers; internal changes to layout of residential accommodation; and associated external alterations; NAMELY, to amend the drawings to allow for the addition of a plant enclosure area to the rear terrace of the development to accommodate air source heat pumps.
